snippet: The introduction of bonus points to the Six ­Nations will improve the British and Irish Lions' hopes of defeating New Zealand for the first time since 1971, Lions and Ireland defence coach Andy Farrell has said....
lead_paragraph: The introduction of bonus points to the Six ­Nations will improve the British and Irish Lions' hopes of defeating New Zealand for the first time since 1971, Lions and Ireland defence coach Andy Farrell has said.

headline.main: Farrell Expects Six Nations Bonus Points to Lift Lions
headline.print_headline: Farrell Expects Six Nations Bonus Points to Lift Lions
